short_summary: Canada (NRCan) has a mandate to complete thematic groundwater studies and mapping of Canadian Aquifers.
description: Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) has a mandate to complete thematic groundwater studies and mapping of Canadian Aquifers. As part of the Groundwater Geoscience Program, this theme has a 5 year time frame (2019–2024) and expectations to deliver innovative science on aquifers to support economic prosperity for Canada.
tags: environmental impact studies,groundwater geoscience programmethematic groundwater studies
full_summary:
**National Scale Data Enhancement for Groundwater-Surface Water Modelling**
--------------

### Tender Information

| **Category** | **Value** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | PW-22-01011270 | National scale data enhancement for groundwater–surface water modelling |
| **Solicitation Number** | NRCan-5000069789 | Request for proposal |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2022-11-24T14:00:00 | Tender closing date |
| **Publication Date** | 2022-10-25 | Publication date |

### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity:** Natural Resources Canada
* **Region of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Region of Delivery:** Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 580 Booth St, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E4, Canada

### Trade Agreements

* **Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement**
* **Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement**
* **Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)**
* **Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)**
* **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**
* **Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement**

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Bolduc, France
* **Contact Email:** france.bolduc@rncan-nrcan.gc.ca
* **Contact Address:** 1055 rue du P.E.P.S., C.P. 10380, Québec, QC G1V 4C7

### Tender Description
Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) has a mandate to complete thematic groundwater studies and mapping of Canadian Aquifers as part of the Groundwater Geoscience Program.

### Terms and Conditions

* A Request for Proposal (RFP) was issued for National scale data enhancement for groundwater–surface water modelling.
* The bid closing date is 2022-11-24T14:00:00.
* A list of trade agreements that are applicable to this contract is provided.

### Resources

* A PDF document containing the tender information can be found at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/25/eaa2e675f9c245ce5a80910875cf85c9/rfp_-_nrcan-5000069789.pdf

Note: A more detailed description of the project, its goals, and its requirements is provided in the attached PDF document
